rawContent:
# View Project Documentation

[useCase]
id = "uc_view_documentation"
name = "View Project Documentation"
asRole = "visitor"
iWant = "view project documentation"
soThat = "I can understand the project structure and requirements"

[useCase.meta]
isActive = true
priority = 1

[useCase.conditions]
pre = [
  "Documentation server is running",
  "Project manifests are available"
]
post = [
  "User has viewed documentation",
  "Documentation is displayed correctly"
]

# Relations - keys match folder names in layers/
[relations]
roles = ["visitor", "user"]
guards = ["public"]

[implementation]
route = "/docs"
component = "DocsPage"
file = "core/app/src/pages/Docs.tsx"
preview = "/docs"
status = "implemented"

# Mermaid diagram - automatically rendered as ReactFlow
[mermaid]
title = "Documentation Flow"
code = """
graph LR
    A((Start)) --> B[Navigate to /docs]
    B --> C[Load TOML/MD files]
    C --> D{Valid?}
    D -->|Yes| E[Parse content]
    D -->|No| F[Show error]
    E --> G[Render UI]
    G --> H((End))
    F --> H
"""

# Flow diagram - visual representation of how the use case works
[[flow]]
id = "navigate"
type = "start"
label = "User navigates to /docs"

[[flow]]
id = "read_files"
type = "action"
label = "Server reads TOML/MD files"

[[flow]]
id = "parse"
type = "action"
label = "Parse and validate structure"

[[flow]]
id = "render"
type = "action"
label = "Render documentation UI"

[[flow]]
id = "display"
type = "end"
label = "User views documentation"
